data.title: Forgotten password
data.solution:
import sys
import math

# Auto-generated code below aims at helping you parse
# the standard input according to the problem statement.

s = input()

# Write an answer using print
# To debug: print("Debug messages...", file=sys.stderr, flush=True)

if "_" not in s:
    print(s.replace("?","_"))
else:
    parts=s.split("_")
    if "?" in parts[1]:
        parts[1]=str(sum(ord(x) for x in parts[0])%256)
    else:
        missingLetter=chr((int(parts[1]) - sum(ord(x) for x in parts[0] if x!="?"))%256)
        parts[0]=parts[0].replace("?",missingLetter)
    print("_".join(parts))
data.statement:
You are tasked to retreive the missing character of a password (marked as a {{?}})
The password has always the following structure:
- a string alphanumeric characters
- an underscore ({{_}})
- a number that is the sum of the ascii values of all the characters of the first string, modulo 256

for example, the password {{pass_183}} is valid because the ascii values of {{pass}} are 112,97,115,115 and (112+97+115+115) modulo 256 = 183

Examples:
`
<<Input>>           <<Output>>
pa{{?}}s_183        pass_183
S0meth1ng_{{?}}5    S0meth1ng_55
test{{?}}192        test_192
`
data.constraints:
6<=length of [[s]]<=30
There is always a solution
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> a string [[s]] containing a password with a missing character ({{?}})

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are tasked to retreive the missing character of a password (marked as a ?)
The password has always the following structure:
- a string alphanumeric characters
- an underscore (_)
- a number that is the sum of the ascii values of all the characters of the first string, modulo 256

for example, the password pass_183 is valid because the ascii values of pass are 112,97,115,115 and (112+97+115+115) modulo 256 = 183

Examples:

Input           Output
pa?s_183        pass_183
S0meth1ng_?5    S0meth1ng_55
test?192        test_192
Input
Line 1: a string s containing a password with a missing character (?)
Output
Line 1: The valid password
Constraints
6<=length of s<=30
There is always a solution
Example
Input
pa?s_183
Output
pass_183
